Simon Cowell is apparently planning to unveil his US line-up as early as next week, and if he take Cheryl Cole and Dermot with him, it will cause major headaches for ITV. A show source said: ITV is pulling out all the stops to ensure Simon Cowell can do both shows, but he still hasn't agreed anything, which is frustrating. If Cheryl Cole and Dermot also have to travel back and forth it could be tricky. The last thing they want is for any of them to pull out.
